oldValue.description: Active Directory Principal who’ll get owner access on the new subscription.

value.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the canceled subscription

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being enabled

value.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

error.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
Error message indicating why the operation failed.

oldValue.description: The parameters required to create a new CSP subscription.

displayName.description: The friendly name of the subscription.

serviceProviderId.description: Service provider ID, basically MPN Id.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the Azure plan. Azure plan determines the pricing and service-level agreement of the subscription.  Use 001 for Microsoft Azure Plan and 002 for Microsoft Azure Plan for DevTest.

oldValue.description: The parameters required to create a new subscription.

additionalParameters.description: Additional, untyped parameters to support custom subscription creation scenarios.

billingProfileId.description: The ARM ID of the billing profile for which you want to create the subscription.

costCenter.description: If set, the cost center will show up on the Azure usage and charges file.

displayName.description: The friendly name of the subscription.

managementGroupId.description: The identifier of the management group to which this subscription will be associated.

owner.description: Active Directory Principal who’ll get owner access on the new subscription.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the Azure plan. Azure plan determines the pricing and service-level agreement of the subscription.  Use 001 for Microsoft Azure Plan and 002 for Microsoft Azure Plan for DevTest.

value.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscriptions that is being renamed

subscriptionLink.description: The link to the new subscription. Use this link to check the status of subscription creation operation.

value.description: The new name of the subscription.

oldValue.description: status of the subscription POST operation.

statusDetail.description: Status Detail of the pending subscription

oldValue.description: A list of pending subscription operations.

items.description: status of the subscription POST operation.

statusDetail.description: Status Detail of the pending subscription

parameters.oldValue: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2018-11-01-preview
parameters.value: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2019-03-01-preview

schema.description: The new name of the subscription.
